cont.entity_a: Well-constructed and durable, surviving drops with minor bruises. Solid construction, even after years of use. Canon's build quality is reliable.
cont.entity_b: Superior build quality compared to Canon Rebel series. Built like a tank.

cont.entity_a: Canon quality at a reasonable price. Offers a good balance between price and quality. Excellent megapixel numbers for the price.
cont.entity_b: Camera's value has decreased over time. A new $600 DSLR offers better value and features.

cont.entity_a: Great for photography classes and comparable to Nikon D3000. Great for capturing fast action shots.
cont.entity_b: Excellent for general and close-up photography.

cont.entity_a: Camera is reliable and easy to figure out. Controls are easy to access and understand. Camera settings are displayed well on the large LCD. User-friendly settings with minimal digital noise in high ISO settings. Ease of use and image quality are highly praised. Recommended for hobbyists and aspiring photographers.

Lens included is very nice. Kit lens is not ideal for low-light shots; better lenses are recommended. Canon lenses from older models are compatible. Lens compatibility is outstanding. Flash does not work; lens advertised was not received. Canon's lens selection is extensive.

High-quality, takes excellent high-res digital photos. Takes fast, high-quality pictures with reduced red-eye. Camera takes amazing pictures and is versatile. No shutter delay, capturing shots without missing moments.
cont.entity_b: Image quality can be matched by new point-and-shoot cameras.

cont.entity_a: The XTi is smaller and lighter than previous models, with a larger LCD display. Compact and light with a small footprint. Good for travel due to its light weight. Camera is compact and easy to carry. Camera fits well in small hands.
Camera provides a lot of creative control. Camera fits all Canon lenses.
cont.entity_b: Pro autofocus with 8.3 FPS and weather sealing.

cont.entity_a: Sensor failure is a noted issue.
Camera offers good value for money. A great beginner's DSLR with many manual settings.
cont.entity_b: Solid body with 8fps is impressive for a 10-year-old camera.
